Class ThumbnailVisualization

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.AbstractVisualization
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.thumbs.ThumbnailVisualization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStoreListener, ResultListener, VisualizationListener, ThumbnailThread.Listener, Visualization, java.util.EventListener

extends AbstractVisualization
implements ThumbnailThread.Listener, DataStoreListener, VisualizationListener
